Description.Text:
1 bed apartments and studio sleep up to 2 people (double bed). 2 bed apartments sleep up to 4 people, 2 bathrooms (2 x double beds). With modern kitchens and large windows, Cotham Lawn Serviced Apartments are 15 minutes from Clifton Village. Just meters from BBC Bristol, the apartments have stylish interiors and Wi-Fi access. An exciting new development comprises a stylish and elegant collection of one, two bedroom and studio apartments, all individually designed and furnished to the highest standards. Some apartments with patio garden. Enjoy a modern interior, bright & warm colors, huge top to bottom windows that allows lots of sunshine. Fully equipped kitchen giving you the freedom to eat what you want when you want. Off road parking available on request, please book in advance. Your allocated space will be stated on your permit. Please notify the hotel in advance if you have a large car as some parking restrictions exist at this development. PLEASE NOTE: On arrival at the apartments, all guests will be asked to pay a refundable deposit of 200 GBP. This deposit will be refunded on departure subject to no damages being caused to the apartment.
PLEASE NOTE: Before arrival at the apartments, all guests will be asked to provide a valid credit card as security. This will be held to insure against damage being caused to the apartment and any extras requested.

Brilliantly appointed brand new apartments superbly located for the university, the BBC, the BRI and Childrens hospitals and Bristol city centre. Apartments located within walking distance of Whiteladies Road and Clifton Village. The Downs, Bristol Zoo and Brunel's Suspension Bridge are all close by. The Clifton Down Shopping Centre is opposite the bottom of Cotham Hill. As well as a good mixture of shops, there are a large number of bars and eating places along Whiteladies Road.

Cotham One Bed Studio Apartment - This studio apartment offers one double bed with a weekly maid Service & linen change. All apartments are non-smoking and come fully furnished including Flat screen TVs and a towels/linen for each guest. Optional extras (charged and subject to availability: Parking, Breakfast pack, Broadband, Cot (Please note that bedding for cot is not provided), Early check in, Late check out.
Standard One Bed Apartment - Our standard one bed apartments offer one double bedroom with a weekly maid Service & linen change. All apartments are non-smoking and come fully furnished including Flat screen TVs and a towels/linen for each guest. Optional extras (charged and subject to availability: Parking, Breakfast pack, Broadband, Cot (Please note that bedding for cot is not provided), Early check in, Late check out.
Superior One Bed Apartment - Our superior one bed apartment offers more space than the standard one bedroom apartment with a weekly maid Service & linen change. All apartments are non-smoking and come fully furnished including Flat screen TVs and a towels/linen for each guest. Optional extras (charged and subject to availability: Parking, Breakfast pack, Broadband, Cot (Please note that bedding for cot is not provided), Early check in, Late check out.
Cotham Two Bed Apartment - The two bedroom apartment features two bedroom and two bathrooms with a weekly maid Service & linen change. All apartments are non-smoking and come fully furnished including Flat screen TVs and a towels/linen for each guest. Optional extras (charged and subject to availability: Parking, Breakfast pack, Broadband, Cot (Please note that bedding for cot is not provided), Early check in, Late check out.
